TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ImportCollection extends System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionBaseCollection
Public NotInheritable Class ImportCollection Inherits ServiceDescriptionBaseCollection

summary.span: 提供 类的实例集合，该类表示要导入到 XML Web 服务的文档。

span.span: Provides a collection of instances of the class representing documents to be imported into the XML Web service.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类对应于 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) `` 元素，该元素由根元素括起来 `` 。The class corresponds to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `` element that is enclosed by the root `` element. 有关 WSDL 的更多信息，请参阅 [WSDL](https://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/) 规范。For more information about WSDL, see the [WSDL](https://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/) specification. ## Examples 下面的示例演示类的典型用法 `ImportCollection` 。The following example demonstrates a typical use of the `ImportCollection` class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果集合中的项数已等于集合的容量，则会在插入新元素之前自动重新分配内部数组，从而使容量加倍。If the number of items in the collection already equals the collection's capacity, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted. 如果 `index` 参数等于 ，则将 `import` 参数添加到的末尾 。If the `index` parameter is equal to , the `import` parameter is added to the end of the . 插入点之后的元素向下移动以容纳新元素。The elements after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 `Insert` 方法的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of the `Insert` method. 若要查看用户定义的方法的源 `CreateImport` ，请参阅类随附的示例 。To view the source for the user-defined `CreateImport` method, see the example included with the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行线性搜索;因此，平均执行时间与成正比 。This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to . 跟随删除的元素 上移以占据空出的位置。The elements that follow the removed move up to occupy the vacated spot. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 `Remove` 方法的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of the `Remove` method.
